title: The Spiral Constitution
outcome: Citizens uncover Halden’s spiral diagrams, drawing crowds into open forums in public squares. Spiraling assemblies become the rallying model for discussion and city governance. Human oversight and BCI transparency are openly debated, leading to the drafting of a new, participatory city constitution.

events.description: A cache of Halden’s hand-drawn spiral diagrams and instructions is discovered in his former residence, sparking widespread speculation about his intended legacy for the BCI.
Citizens flood public squares, forming spontaneous spiral-shaped assemblies. These gatherings calmly debate BCI oversight, collective rights, and transparent system governance.

Oksana and Nikola mediate a major city forum, inviting input from previously erased citizens as facilitators. Recording circulates showing spirited, open discussion about freedom, order, and fairness.

A citizen committee finalizes a "Spiral Constitution" draft. It guarantees citizen oversight of the BCI, regular public forums, and safeguards against future automated abuses. The draft awaits citywide approval.
